teaser: 1 billion, $.007, 200 million, 13 years, 3 months, 2 million, 2, 2 years, 20-30, 100 percent. Do you know what these numbers mean?
contentencoded:
It's time for Silicon Tally. How well have you kept up with the week in tech news?

This week, Katie Notopoulos, senior editor at BuzzFeed, talks tech and takes the test.
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Friday, December 6, 2013
title: Your drone delivery has been dispatched: This week's Silicon Tally
description: 1 billion, $.007, 200 million, 13 years, 3 months, 2 million, 2, 2 years, 20-30, 100 percent. Do you know what these numbers mean?
